job.title: Real Estate Manager22
job.description:
Looking to take your corporate real estate development career and join a growing - yes, growing - a national retailer that is opening new stores? Prior experience in retail or restaurant real estate? The Real Estate Manager will assist in ensuring Batteries Plus's store growth plans are met through proper site selection, acquisition, and development. The Real Estate Manager completes extensive market and site analysis nationwide to ensure new sites and rebuilt sites meet expected ROI goals.

Located on-site at Batteries Plus Bulbs corporate office and national headquarters in Hartland, Wisconsin, the Real Estate Manager will work directly with franchisees and brokers in markets across the United States to screen retail store site locations, manage project schedules for new stores build-outs and store renovations. The Real Estate Manager will secure premium real estate lease spaces for store locations to meet growth requirements for both franchise and corporate locations. Locations are selected with a network planning approach based on an established market plan, defined site selection criteria including key demographic data, traffic counts, visibility & access, and area competition.

Batteries Plus Bulbs is a growing national retailer with 700+ stores nationwide and has been acknowledged as an "essential business" and we have remained open to provide our customers with essential products during the current pandemic. Does this Real Estate Manager position sound like the next step in your corporate real estate development career? If yes, apply today for consideration.

Responsibilities:

  • Work directly with franchisees and brokers in the market to screen site opportunities considering defined site selection criteria, market plan, and feasibility
  • Prepare and secure initial site information including space plan, build-out costs, economic valuation, key demographic data, traffic counts, aerial and site photos, competitor info and alternative locations
  • Serve as the primary contact and liaison between Store Operations, Franchise owners, Real Estate, and Senior Management for assigned projects
  • Work with inspectors and other agencies to ensure permits and meet project deadlines
  • Cross-functional collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to meet project deadlines
  • Project Management of multiple projects including new store build-outs, store renovations, and other capital initiatives
  • Negotiate final site economics and business and legal terms for each site in partnership with the internal legal team

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Construction Management, Real Estate, Business Management, or related field
  • 5+ years of increased responsibility leading retail and/or restaurant site development and new store location projects
  • Ability for overnight travel 50-80% by vehicle and plane
  • Must be able to rent a vehicle

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Proven ability to make presentations to senior management and/or groups of employees
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Demonstrated problem-solving skills
  • Highly organized with a sense of urgency and ability to handle multiple projects
  • Excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills

A Bit About Us:

Batteries Plus Bulbs is the nation's largest and fastest-growing battery, light bulb, phone repair and key fob replacement franchise with a nationwide network of over 720 stores. We work hard here at Batteries Plus Bulbs, and we have a lot of fun while we do it. Whether you work in our warehouse, one of our stores or at our corporate headquarters, our goal remains the same: to satisfy our customers, build trust and drive business, while nurturing our team and working to be experts in our fields. That's life at Batteries Plus Bulbs.

Equal Opportunity Employer / Disability / Veteran

job.title: Order Management Specialist
job.description:
Do you have an eye for detail? Enjoy resolving customer inquiries? The Order Management Specialist maintains customer service excellence within our network of franchisees and internal contacts while supporting their order management. Located on-site at the Batteries Plus Bulbs corporate office and national headquarters in Hartland, WI, the Order Management Specialist will work with franchise stores, corporate stores, and our logistics team providing helpful customer service both over the phone and through email communications in a fast-paced, call center environment.

The Order Management Specialist performs accurate data entry, monitors and tracks product orders and shipments from our distribution center to our stores, and answers a high-volume of incoming calls providing trustworthy solutions to solve problems related to product orders, tracking, shipment, delivery, and overall order management for our retail and commercial customers. You will have a passion for customer service and resolving issues, possess basic typing and keyboard skills, have an eye for detail and accuracy, the ability to quickly learn new software systems and processes, and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment with a fun team. We are a growing retailer with 700+ stores nationwide. Does this sound like an exciting career opportunity? If yes, apply today for consideration.

Responsibilities:

  • Order Processing including administering and maintaining the product order process for stores, E-commerce, commercial business accounts, and vendor fulfillment
  • Answer a moderate to high-volume of incoming phone calls in a call center environment
  • Resolve daily order issues through frequent communication through phone and email with Stores, Management, Warehouse Operations, and the Logistics Team
  • Monitor and amend order status reports including data entry and cross-referencing for accuracy
  • Provide internal customer service to franchise stores, corporate stores, and logistics team
  • Resolve issues with incorrect addresses, returns, and freight claims

Qualifications:

  • High school diploma or equivalent
  • Minimum of 1 year of experience in customer service, call center, order management, retail, logistics, freight, catalog fulfillment or e-commerce industry

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Associates Degree in business or related field preferred
  • Proficient with MS Office. Knowledge of Google products / G-Suite helpful
  • Ability to learn and navigate multiple internal databases
  • Basic typing, data entry, and keyboard skills
  • Demonstrated strong attention to detail and accuracy
  • Prior experience in a call center or high-volume phone-based position
  • Passion for customer service and solving problems

A Bit About Us:

Batteries Plus Bulbs is the nation's largest and fastest-growing battery, light bulb, phone repair and key fob replacement franchise with a nationwide network of over 720 stores. We work hard here at Batteries Plus Bulbs, and we have a lot of fun while we do it. Whether you work in our warehouse, one of our stores or at our corporate headquarters, our goal remains the same: to satisfy our customers, build trust and drive business, while nurturing our team and working to be experts in our fields. That's life at Batteries Plus Bulbs.


Equal Opportunity Employer / Disability / Veteran

job.title: Assistant Store Manager, Roanoke, VA
job.description:
Assistant Store Manager

Batteries Plus Bulbs, the nation's largest, fastest-growing battery and light bulb franchise, is looking for a customer-focused Assistant Manager in Roanoke, VA to assist the Store Manager and Store Associates in achieving sales objectives and maintaining efficient store operations.

If you are seeking a new career opportunity, we offer a terrific start: a wide variety of experiences, the chance to grow knowledge and skills, and the opportunity to advance your career. If you're coming to us mid-career, you will find terrific opportunities for growth.

Duties Include:

  • Work with Manager to develop and implement the Store's business plan, and all company programs and initiatives, as well as evaluate performance compared to plan and benchmarks. Implement operational activities to control costs while driving the business.
  • Lead and direct all store operations activities including purchasing, receiving, inventory management, customer order management, sales floor recovery, out-of-stock review and store organization and cleanliness.
  • Support all commercial and retail sales strategies and initiatives.
  • Assist with selection and training of Store Associates, and perform supervisory duties of Store Manager in his/her absence.

Assistant Store Manager Qualifications:

  • Minimum H.S. diploma/equivalent and at least one year retail experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience
  • Ability to lift 50 + lbs
  • Ability to communicate concrete and abstract ideas and understand and communicate directions using both oral and written means
  • Demonstrated ability to work with minimal direction as a resourceful, independent problem solver.
  • Ability to handle multiple projects/tasks and meet deadlines
  • Availability to work a flexible schedule to meet the needs of the business
  • Valid driver's license and clean driving record required

We offer the following benefits to our Assistant Store Managers:

  • Medical, Dental, and Vision
  • Company-Paid Life and Short Term Disability
  • Paid Holidays and Personal Time Off
  • 401(k) with Company Match
  • Tuition Reimbursement
  • Bonus plans

A Bit About Us:

Batteries Plus Bulbs is the nation's largest and fastest-growing battery, light bulb, phone repair and key fob replacement franchise with a nationwide network of over 720 stores. We work hard here at Batteries Plus Bulbs, and we have a lot of fun while we do it. Whether you work in our warehouse, one of our stores or at our corporate headquarters, our goal remains the same: to satisfy our customers, build trust and drive business, while nurturing our team and working to be experts in our fields. That's life at Batteries Plus Bulbs.

Equal Opportunity Employer Disability/Vet.
